discourse_list.title: Clarification on incentive behind Proposing a Block/Building a Block

content.content: On reading through the Beacon chain documentation for the Merge there are a couple of questions I have.  Is there any incentive for being a block builder/ what are your rewards calculated from? Is the reward for a propser = base_reward + (base_reward/proposer_quotient)? Is the proposer randomly selected? Does the lead attestor claim there rewards by simply putting a block header on the block?
